subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn has been dominant in super-G this season, with four victories and two seconds, and was counting on the race to increase her lead over Maria Riesch in the race for the overall title.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn has been dominant in super-G this season, with four victories and two seconds, and was counting on the race to increase her lead over Maria Riesch in the race for the overall title.
